info.title: Discloud API
info.description: Welcome to the DisCloud API! Feel free to query and try out all the routes of our API on this page!

userID.description: The unique identifier of the user

totalRamMb.description: Total RAM allocated to the user (in MB)

ramUsedMb.description: RAM currently being used by the user (in MB)

subdomains.description: List of subdomains owned by the user

customdomains.description: List of custom domains owned by the user

apps.description: List of application IDs owned by the user

plan.description: The subscription plan of the user

days.description: Days remaining in the current plan

hours.description: Hours remaining in the current plan

minutes.description: Minutes remaining in the current plan

seconds.description: Seconds remaining in the current plan

lastDataLeft.description: Time remaining in the current plan

planDataEnd.description: End date of the current plan

avatarURL.description: URL to the application's avatar image

online.description: Whether the application is currently online

ramKilled.description: Whether the application was terminated due to RAM usage

exitCode.description: Exit code of the application if it has stopped

ram.description: RAM allocated to the application (in MB)

mainFile.description: Main file path of the application

autoRestart.description: Whether the application auto-restarts on failure

cpu.description: Current CPU usage of the application

ssd.description: Storage space used by the application

last_restart.description: Time since the last application restart

startedAt.description: Timestamp when the application was started

url.description: URL to download the application backup

ramKilled.description: Whether the application was terminated due to RAM issues

exitCode.description: The exit code of the application process

ramMB.description: The amount of RAM in MB to allocate to the application

modID.description: The unique identifier of the team member

perms.description: Permissions granted to the team member

modID.description: The unique identifier of the user to add as a team member

perms.description: Permissions to grant to the team member

modID.description: The unique identifier of the team member

appID.description: The unique identifier of the application

perms.description: Permissions granted to the team member

ram.description: RAM allocated to the application (in MB)

online.description: Whether the application is currently online

ramKilled.description: Whether the application was terminated due to RAM usage

exitCode.description: Exit code of the application if it has stopped

perms.description: Permissions granted to the team member for this application

avatarURL.description: URL to the application's avatar image

size.description: File size in bytes (only for files)

cPath.description: Full path for new file or directory

cmd.description: Command to execute in the container

tags.name: Explorer
tags.description: Operations for file and directory management

get.description: Returns information about the authenticated user

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to set for the user

example.message: The translation into language fr-FR does not yet exist.

post.description: Upload a new application to Discloud

success.description: When successful, the request may timeout without returning a response

value.message: The discloud.config file was not found within .zip sent.
You have reached the application limit you can host or you allocated all available RAM of your plan.

get.description: Retrieves information about a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to retrieve all applications

example.message: The information of your application has been loaded.

get.description: Retrieves status information about a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to retrieve status for all applications

example.message: The status of your applications were loaded

get.description: Retrieves logs for a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to retrieve logs for all applications

example.message: The logs of your applications were loaded

get.description: Generates and retrieves backup for a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to retrieve backups for all applications

example.message: The backup of your application will be generated successfully

put.description: Starts a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to start all applications

put.description: Restarts a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to restart all applications

put.description: Stops a specific application or all applications

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application or "all" to stop all applications

value.message: Your application has been turned off.
Your app is already turned off.

put.description: Updates the RAM allocation for a specific application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to update RAM for

value.message: The memory of your application has been successfully changed.
You can not put 14000 mb of RAM in your application, only you have 13098 mb of memory RAM.

404.description: Application not found or plan limitation

value.message: Changing the memory used by applications is only available for Carbon or superior donors.

put.description: Updates an existing application by uploading a new version of the code

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to update

example.description: When successful, the request may timeout without returning a response

put.description: Updates the profile information (avatar and name) for a specific application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to update profile for

get.description: List files and directories in the application's directory

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application

parameters.name: cPath
parameters.description: Directory path (defaults to app workDir)

404.description: Application not found or invalid path

post.description: Create a new file or directory in the application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application

404.description: Application not found or invalid path

get.description: Read the contents of a file in the application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application

parameters.name: cPath
parameters.description: Full file path

404.description: File not found or invalid path

put.description: Edit the contents of a file in the application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application

404.description: File not found or invalid path

put.description: Execute a command inside the application container

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application

403.description: No permission - only app owner can execute commands

example.message: You do not have permission to execute commands

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to delete

get.description: Retrieves the list of team members for a specific application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to retrieve team for

404.description: Team not found or plan limitation

team.description: Present only in no team members response

value.message: The moderators system is only available for gold or higher donors.
You are not on any app team

post.description: Adds a new team member to an application with specified permissions

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to add a team member to

value.message: The moderators system is only available for gold or higher donors.
The user who wishes to register as a moderator is not registered on our website.

example.message: This moderator has already been registered.

put.description: Updates permissions for an existing team member of an application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to update team member in

value.message: The moderators system is only available for gold or higher donors.
This moderator does not exist in this app

delete.description: Removes a team member from an application

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: ID of the application to remove the team member from

parameters.name: modID
parameters.description: ID of the team member to remove

value.message: The moderators system is only available for gold or higher donors.
